name: Baseball kid: Pitcher cup
description:
Baseball is your passion? You never miss a match? You play this game as soon as you get the chance? This game is for you! You're the captain of the Black Panthers team. Step into the shoes of a young pitcher. Compete against 20 teams at exciting matches. Help your team to win the match... the season is starting now!

Baseball Kid Pitcher Cup will test your speed ... and your logic. You are about to feel the intensity of a good match of baseball! This game will delight any amateur or professional athletes. Will you manage to beat the opponent teams?

HOW TO PLAY?
You should throw perfect balls to lead your team to victory. For this you need to reproduce firing sequences. Your turn to play now!

CARACTERISTICS
- 20 teams
- 3 different fields
- QTE
- Career Mode
